Expenses.title: Expenses
Expenses.description: Here are the expenses that you created for your group.
Expenses.noExpenses: Your group doesn’t contain any expense yet.

ActiveUserModal.title: Who are you?
ActiveUserModal.description: Tell us which participant you are to let us customize how the information is displayed.
ActiveUserModal.nobody: I don’t want to select anyone
ActiveUserModal.footer: This setting can be changed later in the group settings.

NoRecent.description: You have not visited any group recently.
NoRecent.orAsk: or ask a friend to send you the link to an existing one.

RecentRemovedToast.title: Group has been removed
RecentRemovedToast.description: The group was removed from your recent groups list.

AddByURL.title: Add a group by URL
AddByURL.description: If a group was shared with you, you can paste its URL here to add it to your list.
AddByURL.error: Oops, we are not able to find the group from the URL you provided…

NameField.label: Group name
NameField.description: Enter a name for your group.

InformationField.label: Group information
InformationField.placeholder: What information is relevant to group participants?

CurrencyField.label: Currency symbol
CurrencyField.description: We’ll use it to display amounts.

Participants.title: Participants
Participants.description: Enter the name for each participant.
Participants.protectedParticipant: This participant is part of expenses, and can not be removed.

Settings.title: Local settings
Settings.description: These settings are set per-device, and are used to customize your experience.

ActiveUserField.label: Active user
ActiveUserField.description: User used as default for paying expenses.

TitleField.label: Income title
TitleField.description: Enter a description for the income.

DateField.label: Income date
DateField.description: Enter the date the income was received.

paidByField.label: Received by
paidByField.description: Select the participant who received the income.

paidFor.title: Received for
paidFor.description: Select who the income was received for.

Income.splitModeDescription: Select how to split the income.
Income.attachDescription: See and attach receipts to the income.

TitleField.label: Expense title
TitleField.description: Enter a description for the expense.

DateField.label: Expense date
DateField.description: Enter the date the expense was paid.

paidByField.label: Paid by
paidByField.description: Select the participant who paid the expense.

recurrenceRule.label: Expense Recurrence
recurrenceRule.description: Select how often the expense should repeat.

paidFor.title: Paid for
paidFor.description: Select who the expense was paid for.

Expense.splitModeDescription: Select how to split the expense.
Expense.attachDescription: See and attach receipts to the expense.

DeletePopup.label: Delete
DeletePopup.title: Delete this expense?
DeletePopup.description: Do you really want to delete this expense? This action is irreversible.

ConversationalExpenseForm.extractingDescription: AI is processing your message to extract expense details.
ConversationalExpenseForm.defaultError: I had trouble understanding your expense request.
ConversationalExpenseForm.confirmDescription: Please review and confirm the expense details below.
ConversationalExpenseForm.editDescription: Modify the expense details and create when ready.

TooBigToast.title: The file is too big
TooBigToast.description: The maximum file size you can upload is {maxSize}. Yours is {size}.

ErrorToast.title: Error while uploading document
ErrorToast.description: Something wrong happened when uploading the document. Please retry later or select a different file.

Dialog.title: Create from receipt
Dialog.description: Extract the expense information from a receipt photo.
Dialog.body: Upload the photo of a receipt, and we’ll scan it to extract the expense information if we can.
Dialog.editNext: You’ll be able to edit the expense information next.

TooBigToast.title: The file is too big
TooBigToast.description: The maximum file size you can upload is {maxSize}. Yours is {size}.

ErrorToast.title: Error while uploading document
ErrorToast.description: Something wrong happened when uploading the document. Please retry later or select a different file.

Balances.title: Balances
Balances.description: This is the amount that each participant paid or was paid for.

Reimbursements.title: Suggested reimbursements
Reimbursements.description: Here are suggestions for optimized reimbursements between participants.
Reimbursements.noImbursements: It looks like your group doesn’t need any reimbursement 😁

Totals.title: Totals
Totals.description: Spending summary of the entire group.

Activity.title: Activity
Activity.description: Overview of all activity in this group.
Activity.noActivity: There is not yet any activity in your group.

Information.title: Information
Information.description: Use this place to add any information that can be relevant to the group participants.

Share.title: Share
Share.description: For other participants to see the group and add expenses, share its URL with them.
Share.warningHelp: Every person with the group URL will be able to see and edit expenses. Share with caution!

SchemaErrors.duplicateParticipantName: Another participant already has this name.
SchemaErrors.amountNotZero: The amount must not be zero.
SchemaErrors.amountTenMillion: The amount must be lower than 10,000,000.
SchemaErrors.paidForMin1: The expense must be paid for at least one participant.
SchemaErrors.noZeroShares: All shares must be higher than 0.
SchemaErrors.amountSum: Sum of amounts must equal the expense amount.

prompts.createGroup: Create a new group for our trip
prompts.checkBalance: How much do I owe Sarah?
prompts.groupSummary: Give me a summary of this group

responses.processing: I understand you said: "{message}". Let me help you with that.

errors.title: Processing Error
errors.processingFailed: I couldn't process your request. Please try again or use the traditional interface.

success.expenseCreatedDescription: Your expense has been successfully created!

cleared.title: Conversation Cleared
cleared.description: Your conversation history has been cleared.

help.title: AI Assistant Help
help.description: Ask me anything about managing expenses, balances, or groups. I can help create expenses, check balances, and more!

Balance.needSpecificPerson: Which person would you like to check the balance with?
Balance.participantNotFound: I couldn't find '{name}' in this group.
Balance.activeBalances: {count, plural, =0 {No active balances} =1 {1 active balance} other {# active balances}}
Balance.suggestedReimbursements: {count, plural, =0 {No reimbursements needed} =1 {1 reimbursement} other {# reimbursements}}
Balance.optimizationExplanation: These suggestions minimize the number of transactions needed to settle all balances.
Balance.needSpecificPersonReimbursement: Which person are you asking about?
Balance.historicalExplanation: Historical balance queries are coming soon! For now, here are your current balances.
Balance.unknownQueryType: I'm not sure what balance information you're looking for. Here are your current balances:

history.empty: Start a conversation by typing a message below.
history.emptyWithGroup: Ask me anything about this group's expenses and balances.
